item.title: Report E-2024080585
item.description:
Report E-2024080585

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-28T15:13:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-14
  • City: CHINA GROVE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On August 14, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN1710 was punctured by a forklift and released approximately three (3) quarts of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the impacted site. FCE personnel utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the impacted site. All spent absorbents were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum. The damaged 55-gallon drum was overpacked into one (1) 95-gallon OP drum.
